About FreelanceHub Our Mission FreelanceHub is dedicated to connecting talented freelancers with clients who need quality services. We believe in creating a platform where skills meet opportunities, and where both freelancers and clients can build meaningful professional relationships. Who We Are We are a team of passionate individuals committed to building a fair, transparent, and user-friendly marketplace for freelance services. Our platform is designed to empower freelancers to showcase their talents and help clients find the right professionals for their projects. Why Choose FreelanceHub? Secure Platform: Your transactions and data are protected with industry-standard security. Fair Pricing: No hidden fees. You know exactly what you're paying for. Quality Assurance: All freelancers are verified to ensure quality service delivery. Reliable Support: Our team is here to help you 24/7. Flexible Solutions: From small projects to large contracts, we've got you covered. Get Started Today Whether you're a freelancer looking to grow your client base or a client searching for skilled professionals, FreelanceHub is your gateway to success. Join our community today.

Terms of Service 1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing and using FreelanceHub, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. 2. User Accounts Users must provide accurate information when creating accounts. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. 3. Service Usage FreelanceHub provides a platform for connecting freelancers and clients. We do not guarantee the quality or completion of any services. 4. Payment Terms All payments are processed through our secure payment system. Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis. 5. Prohibited Activities Users may not engage in fraudulent activities, violate intellectual property rights, or post inappropriate content. 6. Termination We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in harmful activities. 7. Contact Information For questions about these terms, please contact us through our contact page.

- [x] Create admin/categories.php: List all categories with options to view, edit, activate/deactivate, and delete. Include a form to add new categories. - [x] Create admin/category-action.php: Handle actions like add, edit, delete, activate, and deactivate categories. - [x] Test the new pages to ensure CRUD operations work correctly. - [x] Verify that category changes reflect in other parts of the site (e.g., gig creation, browsing).
